RandomBrightness.name: Random brightness
RandomBrightness.description:
Randomly transforms image brightness.
Brightness intensity is uniformly sampled in (intensity_min, intensity_max). - intensity < 1 will reduce brightness - intensity = 1 will preserve the input image - intensity > 1 will increase brightness.
See https://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/3.0.x/reference/ImageEnhance.html.

RandomContrast.name: Random contrast
RandomContrast.description:
Randomly transforms image contrast.
Contrast intensity is uniformly sampled in (intensity_min, intensity_max). - intensity < 1 will reduce contrast - intensity = 1 will preserve the input image - intensity > 1 will increase contrast
See https://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/3.0.x/reference/ImageEnhance.html.

RandomSaturation.name: Random saturation
RandomSaturation.description:
Randomly transforms saturation of an RGB image.
Saturation intensity is uniformly sampled in (intensity_min, intensity_max). - intensity < 1 will reduce saturation (make the image more grayscale) - intensity = 1 will preserve the input image - intensity > 1 will increase saturation
See https://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/3.0.x/reference/ImageEnhance.html.

RandomLighting.name: Random lighting
RandomLighting.description:
The "lighting" augmentation described in AlexNet, using fixed PCA over ImageNet.
The degree of color jittering is randomly sampled via a normal distribution, with standard deviation given by the scale parameter.

scale.name: Scale
scale.description: Standard deviation of principal component weighting.

RandomFlip.name: Random flip
RandomFlip.description: Randomly flips the image in horizontal and/or vertical direction with the given probability.

RandomRotation.name: Random rotation
RandomRotation.description: Randomly rotates the image counterclockwise around the center.

angle.name: Angles
angle.description: A list of angles to randomly choose from, if "Sample style" is 'choice'. If it is 'range', the smallest and largest values of the list will be chosen as [min, max] accordingly.

expand.name: Expand image
expand.description: Choose if the image should be resized to fit the whole rotated image (ticked; default), or simply cropped (unticked).

RandomCrop.name: Random crop
RandomCrop.description: Randomly crops a patch out of an image.

crop_size.name: Cropping size
crop_size.description: Enter relative values [0, 1] if a "relative" cropping type has been chosen, or absolute pixel values otherwise.

Resize.name: Resize
Resize.description: Resizes the input image to a fixed target size.

cpu.name: CPU
cpu.description: Run ResNet on the CPU and with system RAM.

add_missing.name: Add new label classes
add_missing.description:
If checked, neurons for newly added label classes will be added to the model.
Note that these new classes need extra training.

remove_obsolete.name: Remove obsolete label classes
remove_obsolete.description: If checked, neurons from label classes not present in this project will be removed during next model training.

DETECTRON2.SOLVER.IMS_PER_BATCH.name: Batch size
DETECTRON2.SOLVER.IMS_PER_BATCH.description: Number of images to train on at a time (in chunks). Reduce number in case of out-of-memory issues.

DETECTRON2.SOLVER.CLIP_GRADIENTS.NORM_TY.name: Type of gradient norm to calculate

transform.name: Transforms
transform.description: Transforms are used to prepare images as inputs for the model, as well as to perform data augmentation.

transform.name: Transforms
transform.description: Note that inference transforms exclude geometric data augmentation options.
